creator: eric.awater@kadaster.nl
text:
The hyperlinks to an external url disappear in PDF when I use viewbox.
In SVG it works well, but when i use FOP to convert it in PDF, the hyperlinks 
disappear.
Is this a bug ???

If you are not sure, questions should be asked on the fop-user mailing list, 
not in the bug database. 

In order to investigate if this is a bug or not, can you please attach (not 
copy & paste) sample files to this bug report. Thanks.
creator: bowditch_chris@hotmail.com

text: Fixed in FOP 0.94 and probably earlier versions
creator: pascal.sancho@takoma.fr

text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
